app/src/components/threads/ThreadBuilder.description: Commit 563ece1fbd was the final commit in PR #4 (Thread Builder feature). Codex identified P1 issue: ThreadBuilder.tsx memoizes only on activeThreadId, preventing re-renders when threadTweets table changes (add/delete/reorder). Needs TinyBase subscription hook like useTable/useSortedRowIds/useRowIds.

app/src/lib/scoring/calculator.ts.description: Commit 563ece1fbd included calculator.ts which has P2 issue: calculateThreadScore uses local generateThreadSuggestions stub that only sees scores. The complete text-aware implementation exists in suggestions.ts but isn't used, preventing hook/CTA/climax suggestions based on tweet text.
